label: 徳川家宣
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: Sixth shogun (1709-12).  Ienobu's adviser was the remarkable Confucian scholar Arai Hakuseki (1657-1725), who was instrumental in rationalizing several aspects of bakufu policy, including fincance and trade (pp. 20-21).  [新井白石]
